column2: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Comfort Systems USA increases quarterly dividend (Corrects to “increases” in first bullet) July 26 (Reuters) - Comfort Systems USA Inc: * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.085PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Comfort Systems USA Reports Q1 EPS $0.44 April 26 (Reuters) - Comfort Systems USA Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $464.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $442.6 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * BACKLOG AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $1.08 BILLION AS COMPARED TO $948.4 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Comfort Systems USA Increases Quarterly Dividend April 26 (Reuters) - Comfort Systems USA Inc: * BOARD DECLARED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.08 PER SHARE, WHICH IS A $0.005 INCREASE FROM COMPANY’S MOST RECENT DIVIDEND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
